Welcome to the Shared Seas Lab!

This site serves as the comprehensive lab manual for the Shared Seas Lab, located on UMass Dartmouth's [School for Marine Science and Technology](https://www.umassd.edu/smast/) campus with the Department of Fisheries Oceanography (DFO).
